answers.answer: Sorry, I do not know. I would ask your doctor. Good luck!
My sister in law has been warned about it in her second pregnancy and was told to cut down on the sugary drinks and so on. Your doctor or midwife will be able to tell you more though!

question: This is my second pregnancy and I am almost 11 weeks. In my first pregnancy I had geostationary diabetes, and was wondering if you automatically get it again in 2nd,3rd or 4th pregnancies?  Is this something that because I have the experience from the first time, I can stop it from happening this time?  Please any one with answers /experience please help!
title: gestational diabetes
